block_comment: This block of code maps data to a specific byte lane based on a byte selection counter. The selection is executed at every positive edge of the clock. Using non-blocking assignment, the 96 bit-wide slice from FULL_DATA_MAP, starting from the index calculated as `12*DQ_PER_DQS*byte_sel_cnt_w1`, is loaded into `byte_sel_data_map` after a delay of `TCQ` time units.
